title: Wallpaper-based dynamic theming could make its way to more Android 12 devices soon
content:
Google may soon require all Android OEMs that ship devices with Google Mobile Services to offer users a Material You-style dynamic theming system. The company is reportedly looking to make this mandatory for Android phones and tablets that ship with Android 12 or are getting an Android 12 update. According to Android Police, a reliable

The post Wallpaper-based dynamic theming could make its way to more Android 12 devices soon appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google might soon require all OEMs to ship a Material You-style dynamic theming system with the Android 12 updates for their devices.
